text:
NAEB U
TO DOTTY FROM HERE HEH BY MLM
IF AT ALL POISIBLE NEED TO INSERT IN DEC NL A STORY RE THE FACT
THAT WALDO ABBOT UNIV MICH DIED LAST SATURDAY HE WAS ON EOF THE
PIONEERS AND SERVED ON NAEB BOARD AT ONE TIME ETC SHOULD HAVE A VERY
NICE STORY GET DETAILS FROM SCHOOLEY FOR AS MUCH STORY AS YOU NEED
IF DCAN NOT DO IT NOTIFY ME IMMEDIATELY
PRESUME SINCE YOU DID NOT SAY OTHERWISE CONVETNION STORIES TWXD TO
YOU LAST FRIDAY WERE UNDERSTANDABLE
HAVE TENTATIVE PLANS TO COME TO URBANA AROUND DEC 14 OR 17 TO DISCUSS
DUES BILLING WITH DOTTY WILL YOU BE THERE THENX THIS DOESNT MEAN
BILLING START WILL BE HELD UP IN FACT AM SENDING SOME INFO OF
CERTAIN MEMBERS WHO CAN BE BILLED TODAY OR TOMOROW THE VISIT WILL BE
MERELY TO MAE CERGCERTAIN THERE ARE NO PROBLEMS AND TO TAKE CARE OF
ANY REALY KNOTTY BILLINGS
RE NAEB DAVI JOINT MEMBERSHIP THIS WAS APPROVED SOME MONTHS AGO AND THE
TWO STAFFS HAVE WORKED OUT MOST OF THE DETAILS HOWEVER THERE
ARE STILL A FEW MECHANICS TO WORK OUT AND A JOINT BROCHURE EXPLAINING
TO ALL MEMBERS TO GET OUT ET C THIS WILL TAKE A LITTLE LONGER
THEREFORE YOU SHOULD WRITE TO ETHERIDGE AND OTHERS THA T INQUIRE THAT
THE JOINT MEMBERSHIP SIS APROZVED BUT THAT ETAILS ARE STILL BEING WORKED
OUT AND ALL MEMBERS OF BOTH ORGANIZATIONS WILL BE NOTIFIED AND GIVEN
DETAILS WHEN IT IS ALL WORKED OUT
THE INVOICE YOU ASKED ABOUT UTAH STATE WAS PAID ON JUNE 26 FOR
NTWORK 272.50
GA PLS OR END
I WILL BE HERE ON THE DATES YOU ASKED ABOUT
WE GAVE A COPY OF A NEWSPAPER STORY ABOUT ABBOT SO WE WILL GET SOME
THING IN THE NEWSLETTER AT PROOF STGE
BKGKBSSOXHBSDCOVERS IT
OF OK THANKS FOR ESENDING INVOICES SO PROMPTLY RECEIVED SOME
TODAY
END ANRD REGARDS
